 2024-00012024-01-08PMO
ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder Assigning the Minister of State (House of Commons) to Assist the Leader of the Government in the House of Commons
PrecisOrder assigning the Honourable STEVEN GARRETT MACKINNON, Minister of State (House of Commons), to assist the Leader of the Government in the House of Commons in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities, effective January 8, 2024.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2024-0003 Publication Date: 2024-01-17
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order assigning the Honourable STEVEN GARRETT MACKINNON, Minister of State (House of Commons), to assist the Leader of the Government in the House of Commons in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities, effective January 8, 2024.
